content: Dandara broke my COD Mobile addiction! Only thing missing is Cloud Saves so I can play on different devices.
Awesome game, solid gameplay, graphics, sound design. The story is really immersive and well written. It is hard, be prepared!
boring

It's a damn good game ruined by poor controls. If the standard fire mechanic would load faster instead of taking the half-second to energize, if the launch ability would allow for further placement and if the regular shot would go further, it would be ideal. I'm not sure if these are intentional designs that are made to present a challenge but they cause frustration, hinder progress and limit what should be an enjoyable experience. It's only a game, you can allow those things & it's still hard.

Absolutely wonderful. There was so much to do within this game and also the cheat mode in the settings was truly a great help. Thank you for giving us that option. Anyway, I just can't explain it, you have to play it to know what I'm talking about. I totally recommend it and it's worth the price. That's my opinion. I'd love to see a Dandara 2. I just realized, this is the 3rd game I've played from RAW FURY. Awesome developers.

I've had no problems until recently. I found the chest holding the memories shaft upgrade and since opening that chest I have been unable to fire my missiles. By default aiming to shoot and tapping the other side of the screen it now fires a memories shaft rather than the missile. Is there a fix? Plz help so I can continue to play this beautiful and challenging game. Thx!! EDIT: Thank you to the dev. for timely response. Review updated. LOVE and highly recommend!
replyContent: Hi Julie! You can change the power (from Missiles to Shaft and vice versa) by holding over the Power icon (where your energy bar is, below the hearts) and then sliding your finger to choose which power you want.

content: not my cup of tea...a actually quite boring...

Great game, was tempted to try it a while ago but wasn't sure if I'd get on with the control scheme. But now it's on Play Pass I've given it a go and it works great, I'm over two hours in but looks like I've barely scratched the surface! Loads to explore as you get new abilities.
Jogo e q história são maravilhosos, uma experiência muito boa
Taking the classic metroidvania style and combining it with controls that actually work really well on mobile. More mobile games need to be like this.
I like the stylized look but the touch control movement is just too goofy and slow. Might be a better game on a console.
I hate pixelated games.

One of the best mobile games you can find. Great controls designed for touch screen, the combat is so unique with great enemies that react really well to the environment and forces you to play like a puzzle game, yet still rewards quick thinking and twitch movement through a great sense of control and omnidirectional movement. It can have some sharp difficulty curves at times but in general great world and character designs, unique bosses and fun gameplay proves this game is top tier

The gameplay is way to stupid.. you can clearly go to. Better place when jumping, even the marker can reach the spot but you forced to go to another direction.. you're not free to move around.. you must follow paths... Disgusting.. I did love the graphics buy meh.. gameplay is horrible
Amazing. How mobile games should be.

This is the sort of game i have been looking for!!!! I only just started playing but i was in love even before i opened it. I live for metrodvanias with exploration and puzzles with gentle music and story 10 stars!!!
The game grapes low but game action is very nice
Unique metroidvania that is worth it.
If you are a fan of Celeste, play this game!
As of now game loads to a black screen on my Lg G8x on Android 10 but it is truly a unique game.
Jogo magnífico
Great game ! Full of surprises and a compelling story
This is the best adventure puzzle platformer game of the last several years & possibly the next several years!
Very nice, good music, pretty pixels, movement is fresh and different, and it controls perfectly with my gamepad. Didn't like the final boss though.
Works great now! Still difficult now and then but 100% worth picking up
replyContent: Thanks for your review! Our latest update added supported to many other gamepads, unfortunately we can't try them all, but there's a chance it might have solved your problem as well.

content: Great game. Only played 10 min, but I felt compelled to give 5 stars. It has been a long time since I played a good game as this one, with such a good gameplay and music. This is a lesson of how to make mobile games. Congratulations Raw Fury.

It's a really good game, but controller support is worthless since all of the buttons are mapped wrong, and some functions aren't even mapped to the controller. The game is still fun with touch controls, but I wish that it worked properly with controller since that was one of the reasons why originally decided to get it. Maybe it's different with other controllers (I use a DS4).
Much love. Many plays.
What can I say? 10/10
An excellent game. Fun exploring. Propably one of the best experience I had in a smartphone. Totally worth it

One of the best mobile platformers i have played thus far. Really has that old school Metroid feel. Made with a lot of care and love. A welcoming change in pace from all the cashgrab apps that are out there. A big thanks to the devs for keeping gaming alive and well!
Awesome!!!

Awesome metroidvania game with very different movement than other 2d games. I had to buy the console version after playing it on my phone because I would get super tired hands after playing for a bit. Recommended a controller to play this for extended periods of time!

Fantastic game! I loved to see the fresh scenario and the Brazilian mythology and history being incorporated into it! I'm a Brazilian myself and really appreciated your take on our history :). In terms of gameplay: there's a great video on YouTube by a YouTuber called 'Snoman Gaming' on the game. You should definitely check it out! Other than that I can tell you that both Xbox 360 and touch controls are tight and that this game is full of depth. Great, challenging learning curve :))
interesting and challenging game. UI could be a lot better though, and ending is very disappointing. Also the Xbox 360 controller has bugged button mapping. emailed rawfury but received no reply
Pretty lame that its not free roam and you have to use the teleport thing, am i able to get a refund?

Fantastic game experience. This game takes the classic metroidvania game format and turns it on its' head with an innovative movement system that is very satisfying to use. The touch controls are very well done and feel fairly natural even after playing on the console version.

Great game on PC or Mobile. FANTASTIC TOUCH CONTROLS!! I now prefer the touch controls in this game rather than a controller. Just a flick of your finger will send your character flying across screen, which is super satisfying. It definitely takes time to learn but it feels precise enough. Plus you don't need the hassle of using a controller with your phone.
Great experience, fun world. Wonderful way to spend 8-ish hours. The big mechanical conceit (swipe-based movement) works really well. Edit: I went back and played another three hours. Loved it.

You NEED a controller to properly enjoy this game! The touch controls for this game are great but it is very hard to be fast with touch controls. The moving mechanic is very weird at first but once you get used to it, it feels great! It's always nice to see games that take a risk with different mechanics. BTW... Final boss is WAY too hard compared to the rest of the bosses! I think it needs a little bit of rebalancing!

This game is SOOO GOOD!! Truly, this is one of the best games I have ever played on mobile. The soundtrack is so good I bought the digital version of it. The game is challenging and boss fights are insane and insanely fun. Great story and setting. Gameplay is like Bionic Commando mixed with Dark Souls mixed with Metroidvania. Money well spent. I love this game!
Beautiful game and interesting new take on platformers, but the secret rooms can get annoying sometimes.
Amazing

AAA PLATFORMER ON MOBILE! I feel like so many devs dumb-down their games for mobile. But DANDARA really innovates and shows that you can have just as great a gaming experience on a phone. This is a stellar game! The mobile control scheme is brilliant. The game requires you to react quickly. It's challenging. The levels are expansive. The 8-bit artwork is beautiful and spectacular. And the story alluded to is poetic. I'm really impressed! Thank you to the team who made it! You're amazing!
Latest updates cause this game unplayable offline..pls have it fixed... Edit: Dev fixed the problem..TQ
Cant play offline. Always requires me to have an internet connection to verify its license.
Awesome
Frustrating

I've been gaming for decades and this is my first Metroidvania, but this is my kind of game. The pixel-art is stunning, the music is ethereal, the learning curve isn't too steep and the challenges are fair. The level design is linear enough to not completely stump you and open enough to make you feel free to choose. The discovery of certain tricks makes you rethink every nook and cranny you've seen. I'm awed by this world and frustrated with its hostility. Free new content? Yes, please!
The game is very fun, difficult at times, but neither the less very fun. The game sounds amazing and the graphics are colorful and bright .

Wonderful game. Great design, style, graphics, and music. Minimal but fairly intriguing story. Almost finished it for the first time, and I love it. Touch controls are fantastic for mobile, though very, very occasionally I'm unable to use additional weapons for no reason. This game feels a little like a simplified, mobile-first Dead Cells with its own spin on mechanics. Absolutely worth the price (and an absolute must if you catch it on a discount).

Dandara could have been a great game but I just can't help but be frustrated with so many things 1) Leaping all the time from place to place can give you serious motion sickness. 2) The map is horrible this whole game is a labyrinth without any sign of where to go next and traversing the map is so hard and boring 3) The in game places are boring like there was no effort put into them (similar looking places) The only good parts were the boss fights Loved the forest design.

Game was fine for a bit but it just became far too difficult. Got caught in a four enemy loop of getting hit by projectiles and enemies that couldn't be destroyed. I find enjoyment in some difficultly but this is overly difficult with the type of movement needed. I can't shoot fast enough, the charge time was infuriating. Maybe better with a controller.

Very great game. Nice graphics and very fond of this game using my 8bitdo SN30 Pro Plus Controller. It feels like playing a portable game on my Samsung Galaxy S10E and Dex Station via Nintendo Switch inspiration
A very unique game. This is a full fledged singleplayer game, with unique movement system that works so well with mobile devices. A challenging but not impossible journy.
Realmente gostei, visual incrível, imersivo e com boa dificuldade

Somewhat frustrating due difficult level, Dandara is a excellent full metroidvania (new abilities unlocking new areas, character levelling up through some grinding, open-world map with extensive backtracking). Sometimes it makes me almost give up, but I always came back for a new attempt. The graphics and soundtrack are beautiful, the mechanics is original, to say a little, and the dual-stick controls are perfectly fine for touch screens.
Crashes on Sony Xperia 1 Mark 2
Great on the galaxy S10+ controls are fine
Controls felt intuitive and loved the art style. Great work guys!
There's only one thing I can say about this game, it is art.
Such a cool game, challanging and fun. One of the best games i have played on telephone.
Incredible game! Definitely worth it. Beware, the game is hard, it remembered me of celeste, both in challenge and quality. This is one of those games more art than game
Really nice gameplay dynamics and atmosphere
Amazing job on the game plus more stuff added which is nice , so thank you
Nowadays, there are very few games on Google Play for purchase that are good and legit like this one. BEWARE.
This game is genius and I always have fun in this game
Amazing experience
Muito bom
Since the Trials of Fear update, this won't even load. Title screen, loading bar, then blank screen. Very sad.

Disappointment. Game sports really decent graphics and audio. The biggest problem is that controls ruin the gameplay. And there is no cure for that. Its too difficult and frustrating. This type of games always fail on touchscreen. I regret this purchase.

This game remind me of Celeste. Same graphics, mechanism mostly the same, and the music are great except for enemies and shooting enemies. It's quite hard to play without a controller but if you keep on practicing you will master this game. Great game and i recommend it.
Really enjoyable and stands out and the length of it is amazing depending on how much you take the time out to explore and challenge everything.
What an amazing game! Awesome pixel art, smooth animation, OST, magical story; smooth and snappy controls. Loving the ride..
Awesome game
Sensacional
Excellent game
Good game if you like exploration and puzzles. Though, this game will be easier with controller.
Masterpiece, I would by 5 times this game.
In my opinion the best way to play this game is on a touch screen mobile device. Loved it!
Amazing and Unique platformer metroidvania. Had issues running on Google Pixel 4 at first but it works now.
Great game. Im at the final boss and dont mind the struggle. The whole game was such a fun ride and i love the snappy controls.

Very challenging, too much at times, especially timed section, losing the fun some. Movement takes getting used to but is a welcome change. No way to bank money, if died have to backtrack to regain money lost but difficulty can see you dying again losing all of it and theres not much to gain or grind. Looks amazing w/great music/sfx & well wrote story. Solid platforming(?) Metroidvania but can get lost or confused with no direction on whats next. Worth the price but maybe use a guide when lost.
Parece um bom game, mas os controles não conversaram comigo.
Muito bom, parabéns ao estúdio 1) por não abandonar o game e lançar conteúdo novo. 2) por ser um estúdio Br fazendo algo tão bom e original.
Como estudante de programação, obcecado por game development e (claro) brasileiro, digo: eu amo um jogo!
Top notch console metroidvania, perfectly suited to mobile controls
Dark Souls meets bullet hell and metroidvania

Um dos melhores se não o melhor jogo que eu já joguei. Eu simplismente amei o floucorio envolvido no jogo e os gráficos são muito bons, o fato que você pode mudar a dificuldade do jogo e muito legal, a o todo um jogo excelente

Incredible game. Well made, super fun controls, interesting story, and it's not incessantly monetized like so much other cancer in the mobile gaming sphere. If one time a year I was able to give a game more than 5 stars, this is the game I would give it to! This game is the new standard by which I judge all other mobile games now.
Excelent music, great gameplay!

This game demands a certain level of commitment and, dare I say, courage. The combat is a whirlwind, disorienting game of chess played at breakneck pace. Antagonists range from the mildly annoying to the blood-curdling to the soul-crushing. The allegorical storyline, gorgeous pixel art, riveting soundscape, and most of all the paradoxically dizzying, punishing and rewarding gameplay combine to craft a pulsating platformer unlike any other. An absolute masterpiece.

O design dos cenários é lindo! As referências a cultura brasileira são perfeitas! Tô travado depois de liberar as caixas de música, não consigo progredir no jogo. Não tira em nada o mérito dessa obra de arte. Parabéns e lancem outros títulos com essa mesma pegada, nós, fãs de metroidvania, 2d e pixelart estamos famintos por conteúdo como o de vocês. Abraços <3
O jogo é bom, mas se eu soubesse que não tem opção de save online não teria comprado

One of my favorite games of all time, hands down. Classic and a masterpiece. I have been unable to get it installed on my new phone. I'm not sure if it's the update or the new phone I just got (pixel 4 xl Android 10) but I have been unable to play it. It downloads and seems to install, but sometimes it says that it failed to install but lets me open it anyway. It then opens, loading screen, it seems to move on but it gives me what looks like the main menu bg and doesn't do anything else. Help?
Wonderful game this is my second time purchasing it on another platform and I swear it probably won't be my last.
Good game
Not just the graphics, but the lore and the gameplay are awesomely made.

Incredible game!! The controls are amazing, I love the fast gameplay, and the challenge was just right for me. The level design and enemy variety kept me on my toes the whole time and I always wanted to see more. It's an awesome looking game, too. If you want a metroidvania that plays well on phones, definitely get this one, it's well worth the price!
Fantastic experience for a mobile game, a fully fleshed out metroidvania that is easy to control via touch screen.
Awesome!👍 Totally a different type of game play. Very challenging!
perfect

Screw this, I'm pissed now. Plated for 7 hours, and now I can't continue after reaching the Eldar City. I have video proof, the game is now eternally stuck in a black screen on that save because I teleported to a specific tent that resulted in me going to another screen. Super pissed and I doubt I will try a new save again. Update: Started a new save thanks to Trials of Fear and I take it back. A great game just became better than before, if not one of the vest Metroidvanias.
replyContent: Hi! This problem has been fixed in the new update.

content: Google play achievements support would be nice

It's probably the best game in the app store ( maybe tied with Kingdom New Lands) . Dandara is a pretty game. It was already worth the money prior to the big content update; the extra content is just Rawfury spoiling us. A perfect 5/7!
Very beautiful game with beautiful music and great gameplay

Haven't played the additional content yet, but just wanted to thank you guys for allowing owners to receive the update for free. Can't wait to dive back into the world of Salt, and will be purchasing the remastered soundtrack ASAP! 💜 Edit: Played the new content. You guys have gone above and beyond. Thank you for this huge new update, much love!
Unique and amazing

Developers: PLEASE add Android TV support. This is a much better experience with a gamepad. This is a good game, and it took me several days to play through. The difficulty is high, but not in a frustrating way. I felt more frustrated with the touchscreen controls than anything, but even these worked better than many other platformer games.

First class soundtrack and gameplay. Its a fairly easy going adventure until the difficulty ramps up suddenly and forces you to adapt. It gets difficult but there are check points, loads of health and cool abilitIes. Story takes bout 7 hours. Some arenas are frantic and there is hardly any chance to recover health if hit which can lead to a quick death. exploration and concept is amazing. some things could be explained, such as using your gun as a propeller and whilst on boxes etc

Honestly, too difficult. That's coming from a person who has played every hardcore metroidvania game ever and enjoys fair difficulty. It honestly feels like the developers were testing the game, thought it was too easy at some point and fixed it by blowing up specific enemies' health, range and attack kd. For a game that uses a very peculiar and limiting movement mechanic, it's a D move. Leaving no options for survival at times. I know it reads like a rage post but go ahead and try it.
Awesome game. Difficult, but I like my games that way. Great music. Highly recommend it.
Finally fixed. Good port for Android.
replyContent: Hi! Do you mean the name in the home screen or in the Application Manager? We just fixed the name in Application Manager and it should come on the next update. Sorry for that!

content: Nice visuals and controls. I like the concept that the floor is lava and you gotta hit certain points to platform (white/salt areas) and shoot enemies.
Very good game with a really neat concept.

Enjouable game, lovely aesthetics, but it's too difficult. The Difficulty curve is just ridiculous when starting the second half of the game...i love hard games but no way.. Devs please do something. Uninstalled it in the mean time, maybe I'll come back to it later when its been adjusted for mortals like me.
Brilliant game!! Delightful gameplay indeed
Good for an android game. A bit lacking for a console game. Still worth it. Adding trophies would be great.
Long story, satisfying battles. Final boss is too hard though.

A fun game for the roughly 8 hours it lasted. The controls are good, better than might be expected when playing on a phone. Some more story would have been nice, and some general sense of direction wouldn't have hurt either (it's kind of hard to remember every skull or pillar you've seen) although the map made it doable. It's easy going for the first couple if hours, the the difficulty ramps up considerably. I'm not the greatest twitch player though and still managed to finish it.

PLEASE fix the controls! They bring down what would otherwise be a great game. I can't even make a risky jump without hitting the pause button for some bizarre reason. At least add a function to let you move the button someplace else. It's super frustrating.
Jogo incrível
Arguably one of the best Indi games

This game is amazing! Metroidvanias are my jam, and this game is one of the best I have played, on any platform. If you have any interest in jumping and/or shooting in games, very highly recommend that you get this one. Especially impressive since this is designed for and plays beautifully on your phone!

Amazing game, It's clearly been designed for mobile devices and it shows. Movement feels specially good even with the limitations of a touchscreen. Metroidvania is my favourite genre and I'm so happy I found a good one on my phone

Dá até saudades dps de jogar, experiência ótima, talvez um pouco curta, talvez se houvesse mais tempo de experimentar as mecânicas com os novos items que ela vai acumulando, aprofundar mais o universo proposto tbm seria incrível

UPDATE: My only biggest problem was the block I ran into after the first boss, there was no indication of how to progress, I had no idea you could toggle the squares to the left or right to get into the desert. The player is not informed in anyway, so therefore you run into a huge block in a very challenging place (the city). Not knowing where to go next while dying many times in the city trying to find out where, is discouraging, thinking the next step is in the city and not the desert.

Eu sou suspeito para falar disso... Amo jogos difíceis, amo platformers e metroidvanias...E os criadores estudam no mesmo prédio que eu kkkkkk. Porém, invariavelmente disso, esse jogo por 7 reais é um roubo, com certeza foi a melhor compra que fiz dentro da Playstore.

Bon joc d'acció de plataformes amb un toc especial. Llarga durada i amb un mapa gran per explorar a mesura que consegueixes noves abilitats. Jugabilitat com un clàssic de plataformes. Si tens un mando Bluetooth millor.
Well done. I've reinstalled this game, where is my saved game data. Isn't there cloud?

Well, I had a whole review here but somehow lost it so here's a quickie: this game is one of the best phone games I've ever played and I'm picky. The controls are perfect for a touch screen and the way your character gets around the map is unique.
Perfect game
Easily one of the best phone games.
Brilliant metrovania type game! Cannot see what the problem is with the controls!!
An excellent concept, design, and story, all beautifully implemented. If you enjoy metroidvania style games play this one.
Awesome game
Greatly enjoyed. Control scheme is clever. Difficulty is hard, but never impossible.

This is 1 of my top 5 all time/genre/platform favorite game ever! However, I do believe that it's missing a much needed "skip current challenge" feature, to move past it & come back to it later or an "auto complete" option, to have the computer complete the current challenge at hand that most players at one point or another will b utterly & frustratingly stuck at until help arrives or sadly they give up entirely & hastily uninstall the game. Or let us pay extra money to unlock a new area.
Awesome metroidvania game.
que jogo maravilhoso!

This game has frustrating controls if you don't have a controller. there's another bigger annoyance. i uninstalled the game when i was frustrated to clear room. it has no cloud save feature. it's not a cheap game, frustrating controls, relatively large size, and you'll lose all progress if you uninstall. so if you get annoyed at the gameplay, you are stuck keeping the game and consuming phone resources or you will have to restart the game. 2 stars as it is a good game with use of a controller.

Absolutely phenomenal metroidvania game with one of the most intuitive controls I've seen in a mobile game. It took me just over 8h to complete on standard difficulty, but there are modifiers that can be added after completing the game for the first time, that adds additional difficulty and replay value.
I wish it had more bosses...
Any chance the developers could look into gamepad compatibility? I've got a gamepad that doesn't work. It's built into my xd+ tablet.

High production values across the board. Gameplay is fun and challenging at times. The amount of content is about sufficient. Biggest issue is the pause button constantly activating even when the hand/finger isnt near the button itself.
Amazing game. One of the best in this genre, and it even controls well on mobile. Crazy!

the new update says you have the ability to "skip the Crib of Creaton".. i actually started a new game just to check this out..and yeah, that option is NOT available. Also, before you could jump through the Crib in a few seconds..but now it's even more difficult? why was this changed, it confuses me quite a bit. I only played for a short bit, so don't know the other changes to the game that might have been made. Controls are just as tight as before, but i don't see these new options mentioned.
replyContent: Hi Aaron! We did want to make a difficult game, but we are sorry it felt frustrating for you. We do have an update coming soon, with improved balancing in many places. Many enemies will give less damage now, and we changed the design in some levels to have a less steep difficulty curve. It is still a tough challenge, but hopefully much more fair!

content: masterclass in game design and execution even on mobile
Gem of a title....one of the best metroidvania for android out there. highly recommend....good job dev!
hi, i have xperia z5 android 7.1 and game crash abit after i close the game. one more thig is when open unity statistics the page wont close even press back bottom. tnx for developing game any way.

Awesome game, very challenging Metroid/Castlevania style game. BUT the pause button, for the love of Christ please move the pause button. At least once every 5 min I hit the pause with the palm of my left hand, move it up to the top or make it a double tap but please do something with it!
awesome game, touch control is easy to use, 9/10 would recommend

A controller is a must for this game, and even so, the game gets pretty tough.It took about 15 tries to get past the floating head boss (and beat him with literally 1 heart left).Now I'm in the area past the broken bridge and can't get past any rooms with any enemies. Again,probably about 10 times trying to get past the same room is sucking the fun out of it.Probably won't see the end of the game because I'm getting bored with it. I wouldn't put this game up to the level of Evo Land or Oceanhorn.

The mechanics and controls are really slick and fun when you finally get the hang of it. Takes a few minutes to get used to, but when you get it and pull off some cool maneuvers, it's rewarding. It has all the Metroidvania elements going on and does it pretty good. The sound with a nice pair of headphones is also really well done. For me, it was fun to a point, probably kinda near the end, but it just got too difficult. Sad, because I really wanted to finish this, but I just can't pull it off.
Amazing game, definitly worth the money, if your in to cool and challenging games this game is for you.
Great sound design, novel mechanics and wonderful artwork
I am just stuck at the loading screen with the loading bar and the picture of the girl, can someone help

Bombed out five times without getting past the intro, even having cleared down the phone's RAM several times. Yes, my phone only has 1GB of RAM, but for goodness' sake, surely a 2D Metroidvania shouldn't be so resource-heavy.

The game is awesome. It is challenging without being Dark Souls. Yeah, the death penalty is punishing, but you can recover what you lost by reaching your corpse just like a lot of games out there. And oh boy, let me tell you something: what an awesome soundtrack! Loving the game!
Um dos melhores jogos pagos pra Android, se vc gosta de metroidvania, pode comprar sem medo.
what a premium game should be

Dandara is an instant classic. Performance is great on mobile; the graphics are beautiful, and so is the music. An excellent, addictive Metroidvania. I will rate it five stars if it ever has full-screen support for smartphones with a notch like mine (Moto G7 Plus).
Best Metroidvania!!!!
Nice game, with a smooth gameplay, beautiful graphics and coll game mechanics !
this game is absolutely fantastic but theres an audio delay when i connect my Galaxy buds and when i go to another app its perfectly fine, are there any fixes?

This is an outstanding game. Took a bit to get used to the controls, as they are a bit unusual for an action game, but very satisfying when I got used to it. Very much a love letter to Metroidvania type games, love the atmosphere and tone of the visual style. Music is amazing. Highest recommendation I can give for a game, would give 10 stars if I could. Worth every dollar and then some.
the controls are terrible.
Beautiful game in 2d graphics. I enjoyed every minute of it, but aware, it gets really challenging sometimea! I suggest adding Google Play Archievements! is Dandara 2 on the way I hope? ;)
you can't even walk in this game. you move about the game by pulling yourself across the screen by using a sort of hook mechanism so annoying. I wish I could get my money back.
Holy shoot, this game is a gem. And the fact that Raw Fury fit it into a mobile app without losing ANYTHING? IT'S WITCHCRAFT! And the game itself is ever enchanting.

cool game, eventually you figure out how to move and jump and kill your enemies. Its worth of price because gameplay is very unique, and intense. Good job guys, and i hope that i will soon see more 2D games with unique gameplay. because this is pure gold here.
i would have given this five stars but some mental giant decided to put the pause button in the same spot as the movement controller. come on man..... idiots.
Excelente metroidvania!

Absolutely amazing game! I love the gameplay, the graphics, the touch controls (it doesn't work with my ipega gamepad, but I don't care since touch controls are just perfect), love the idea, love how it could be fast paced at times, but other times relaxing and just beautiful. Definitely my favourite right now.
Excellent beautiful challenging game

Seriously the best game I ever played on mobile, I'm so happy it came out! It's perfectly compatible with Bluetooth Xbox one controllers, the game is absolutely wonderful, it give a real pleasure for the thumbs, the eyes and the ears, go for it heads down, it's the best advice I can give you if you're interested in platformers, with authenticity and originality. I really love this game and I'm already a fan just after the first minutes. Plus it's a game with a colored female protagonist, bravo! ❤

For those who are searching for a good metroidvania I would definitelly recommend this one. Nice story and good challenge level. No in-app purchases is a plus that should be followed by all premium games. Good job devs, thanks for the game.

This game is way to unnecessarily difficult it brings it to the point that it's not even fun anymore because I have to repeat the same area 70x the penalty for dying is way to extreme and the game isn't near forgiving enough. And I'm not saying difficulty is bad but theres a certain degree of difficulty, if you're reading this dont spend $15 on this game its really not worth it unless you like extremely frustrating games
Great game, but my gamepad doesn't work, as only the start button does anything. Would be amazing if you could remap buttons.
Need update more skill and more gameplay . Please add save progress i hate to play it from the beginning when i uninstall it. Please guy make it worth 20 dollar
Very good metroidvania

Intense game with fantastic music, a very fluent playstile and a aweseome 
design

Plays amazingly on the touch screen. Feels fast and fluid, and really 
challenging without feeling unfair.

This is a really good game that, in my opinion, needs two things changing 
to make it great - first, the position of the refill health button needs 
moving. Sometimes, you need to press that button real quick and it's not 
instinctive at all to try and hit that tiny button shoved away at the upper 
right corner. The number of times I've died because I've missed the button 
can make the game very frustrating. If you can make it so the player can 
place the buttons wherever they want, that would be much better. The second 
thing is that the game gets way too hard as you progress. I like a stiff 
challenge but this is ridiculous. Way too unforgivable and too frustrating. 
Change those things and what you have is an innovative, absorbing, 
atmospheric, extremely enjoyable metrovania type game.
replyContent: Hi! Thanks for the feedback, indeed the position of the buttons was a difficult decision for us, considering the amount of different devices. Giving the player option is a good idea, although is technically challenging for us to implement (we are a team of only 4) but will consider this. We do have an update coming with a lot of balancing though!

content:
This game is totally worth buying and playing. It's difficulty will push 
one to their gaming limits. Gameplay is awesome, controls are perfect, 
graphics is nice. This game is totally worth playing and to mention this is 
a game for hardcore gamers only.

A 5 star game with a controller but too frustrating without. So although I 
could give it a 5 star on, say, a console, I have to rate the mobile 
experience as I see it.
I really love this games.

English version bellow the portuguese one. Finalizei o jogo com um pouco 
mais de 9h de gameplay. Primeiro, eu adorei o jogo, valeu cada centavo e 
certamente é uma ótima escolha para quem quer um metroidvania que tenta 
inovar. A história, apesar de simples, é cheia de significados, a 
dificuldade é no ponto certo, a mecânica é extremamente interessante e é 
divertido ficar deslizando o dedo para lá e para cá enquanto se move pelo 
cenário. Mas nem tudo são flores. Como ponto negativo, a movimentação, em 
alguns momentos, mais atrapalha do que ajuda. Senti que quando são 
necessários movimentos rápidos, o controle acaba sendo impreciso e isso faz 
com que a experiência seja frustrante em determinadas partes, 
principalmente nas duas últimas áreas. Enfim, parabéns aos desenvolvedores, 
é realmente animador ver jogos tão bons, que exaltam nossa cultura sem cair 
no proselitismo, sendo desenvolvidos no Brasil! I finished the game in 9h 
of gameplay. I loved it, worth the money spent and its a very good choice 
for whom is looking for an metroidvania-like game that innovate the genre. 
The lore is simple but has a lot of metaphors, the difficult is in the 
right level, the mechanics is really interesting and is very funny to swipe 
the finger through the screen to move around the cenarios. But as nothing 
is perfect, there are odds. As a negative point, in some situations, the 
moviment style is really cumbersome. When agile movements are required the 
control can be very inaccurate, leading to frustrating experiences, 
especially in the last two areas. Finally, congratulations to the 
developers, is really awesome to see good games, that exalt our culture 
without being boring, made in Brazil. Still learning english, so please 
forgive any mistake :)

An absolute masterpiece of its genre perfectly crafted to fit the mobile 
touchscreen

A pretty challenging game but also very rewarding upon completion. The 
controls may take some time to get used to but I feel the touch screen 
makes it so much more precise an easy. Overall, a very solid game!

Unfortunately, I have to side with the review of "a google user"; on gpd 
xd+ it's the same thing: the start button works, but not the'a' button or 
the twin sticks (tried both xbox360 and ps4 'emulation' on it). The game 
plays better than i expected on touch screen, but thus far it's not in the 
area of comfortable.

Premium Mobile gaming at its finest, right here! If you're the type that 
doesn't like on-screen controls with your metroidavania then don't bother 
because it takes some getting used and you'll end up giving otherwise great 
game a bad review because of your shortcomings but if you don't mind & like 
a challenge then you're in for an awesome experience.

replyContent: Oi Pablo! O download para na Google Play? Se sim esse seria um problema no App da Google Play. Se for um loading dentro do jogo avisa a gente que vamos dar uma olhada. O jogo tinha um sistema de download próprio mas já não existe mais.

content:
I can not believe I spent money on this game. Aside from the landscapes, at 
least the little I've seen, it is awful. Poor controls plus no room for 
error before you die makes this game not any fun at all.

To me the difficulty ruins what would be a fun game. The gameplay isn't so 
fun that I have the drive to get better at it. If you like hard games then 
this is for you. I'm not bad. This game is difficult. The punishment for 
dying in this game is too harsh for how it controls and ultimately I just 
stopped playing it.

An excellent work, definitely. But i personally found it a bit frustrating 
at times. It would have been nice if it had more camps (savegame spots), a 
clearer map and a level design that doesn't look like a maze that much. 
Other than that, a great game.

My 8bitdo SF30 pro controller couldnt play this game. The game registers 
that I have a controller, however clicking any button does nothing. I can 
verify the controller works with other games tho. However, so far so good! 
The touch controls are impressive. Still getting used to the firing of 
attacks tho.

Most mobile games just don't feel right; I can't speak for length but the 
gameplay is solid.
it's a black thing

this game is a work of art, from the world design to the fluidness of it. 
I've already have 5 hours on it and I dont see it getting old, or slowing 
down any time soon

Wow! Just buy this one now. It's one of the best games in the Play store. 
High quality, innovative gameplay, and challenging! Also, you pay for 
everything up front. No microtransactions or advertisements.
This game needs more optimization

This game is beautiful, entertaining, magical, and somewhat mysterious. A prime example of what mobile gaming can aspire to. While it is expensive, it is well worth the price for the enjoyment you will experience.
Great game, well worth the money!
Impressive I would love to see more games like this instead of freemium.

Legendary, something for the history books. I just wish there had been more to it, please please release more content, new game + with double the level cap would be incredible and add so much replay value.... Maybe a truly mirror world too, I like the special room!
Fun but it would be nice to have some more Saving Camp spots.

Fantastic game! It's hard to believe that games like these make it to handhelds. My only issue is the game does not support a 18:9 screen ratio and doesn't fill the screen on my Pixel 2 XL. Hopefully we will see an update to support this in the future.
Moto mods gamepad does not work. Please fix it.

As soon as you start playing you'll realize this game was made with passion. From the new concept of navigation to superb controls to original story and amazing soundtrack: they nailed it. In every detail.
I stopped playing only because my battery died. Addictive and fantastic. Worth every penny.
